001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.ObjectPrinter;
004
005import java.io.File;
006import java.nio.file.Files;
007import java.nio.file.Path;
008import java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes;
009import java.util.Arrays;
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.Map;
012import java.util.NavigableMap;
013import java.util.TreeMap;
014import java.util.stream.Collectors;
015
016import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.DumpUtils.dumpAsJsonTxt;
017import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toSortedMap;
018import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.linkedMap;
019import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.nameValue;
020import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.sortedMap;
021
022/**
023 * TODO: provide the comprehensive Java-Doc and reuse {@link ObjectPrinter} !!!
024 */
025public class SysDumpUtils {
026
027    public static String dumpSysPropsAsJson() {
028        return valueAsJson(dumpSysProps(), 0);
029    }
030
031    public static String dumpSysPropsExAsJson() {
032        return valueAsJson(dumpSysPropsEx(), 0);
033    }
034
035    public static String dumpEnvVarsAsJson() {
036        return valueAsJson(dumpEnvVars(), 0);
037    }
038
039    public static String dumpEnvVarsExAsJson() {
040        return valueAsJson(dumpEnvVarsEx(), 0);
041    }
042
043    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
044
045    /**
046     * @return Java system-properties as a sorted-map
047     */
048    public static NavigableMap<String,String> dumpSysProps() {
049        return sortedMap(System.getProperties().entrySet()
050            .stream()
051            .map(PropertiesUtils::propEntryEsc));
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * @return the same as {@link #dumpEnvVars()}, but the values of {@code xxx.path} properties are transformed to list
056     */
057    public static NavigableMap<String, Object> dumpSysPropsEx() {
058        return dumpSysProps().entrySet().stream()
059            .collect(toSortedMap(SysDumpUtils::transformSysProps));
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * @return environment variables as a sorted-map
064     */
065    public static NavigableMap<String,String> dumpEnvVars() {
066        return new TreeMap<>(System.getenv());
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * @return the same as {@link #dumpEnvVars()}, but the values of {@code xxxPATH} variables are transformed to list
071     */
072    public static NavigableMap<String, Object> dumpEnvVarsEx() {
073        return dumpEnvVars().entrySet().stream()
074            .collect(toSortedMap(SysDumpUtils::transformPathVars));
075    }
076
077    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
078
079    private static Object transformSysProps(Map.Entry<String, ?> entry) {
080        if (!entry.getKey().toUpperCase().endsWith("PATH")) {
081            return entry.getValue();
082        }
083        String pathValue = "" + entry.getValue();
084        return Arrays.stream(pathValue.split(File.pathSeparator)).toList();
085    }
086
087    private static Object transformPathVars(Map.Entry<String, String> entry) {
088        if (!entry.getKey().toUpperCase().endsWith("PATH")) {
089            return entry.getValue();
090        } else {
091            return Arrays.stream(entry.getValue().split(File.pathSeparator)).toList();
092        }
093    }
094
095    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
096
097    /**
098     * @param file a file to get the file-attributes of
099     * @return the attributes of {@code file} as JSON
100     */
101    public static String fileAttrsAsJson(File file) {
102        return fileAttrsAsJson(file.toPath());
103    }
104
105    /**
106     * @param filePath a path to the file to get the file-attributes of
107     * @return the attributes of {@code file} as JSON
108     */
109    public static String fileAttrsAsJson(Path filePath) {
110        try {
111            BasicFileAttributes fileAtrrs = Files.readAttributes(filePath, BasicFileAttributes.class);
112            return dumpAsJsonTxt(linkedMap(
113                nameValue("filePath", filePath),
114                nameValue("fileSize", fileAtrrs.size()),
115                nameValue("creationTime", fileAtrrs.creationTime()),
116                nameValue("lastModifiedTime", fileAtrrs.lastAccessTime()),
117                nameValue("lastModifiedTime", fileAtrrs.lastModifiedTime()),
118                nameValue("isRegular", fileAtrrs.isRegularFile()),
119                nameValue("isDirectory", fileAtrrs.isDirectory()),
120                nameValue("isSymbolicLink", fileAtrrs.isSymbolicLink()),
121                nameValue("isOther", fileAtrrs.isOther())
122            ));
123        } catch (Exception ex) {
124            return dumpAsJsonTxt(JacksonUtils.errorFrom(ex));
125        }
126    }
127
128    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
129
130    public static String seqAsJson(Collection<?> collObj, int indent) {
131        if (collObj == null) {
132            return "null";
133        } else if (collObj.isEmpty()) {
134            return "[]";
135        }
136        return collObj.stream()
137            .map(item -> valueAsJson(item, indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT))
138            .collect(Collectors.joining(
139                String.format(",%n%s", " ".repeat(indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT)),
140                String.format("[%n%s", " ".repeat(indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT)),
141                String.format("%n%s]", " ".repeat(indent))
142            ));
143    }
144
145    public static String mapAsJson(Map<?, ?> mapObj, int indent) {
146        if (mapObj == null) {
147            return "null";
148        } else if (mapObj.isEmpty()) {
149            return "{}";
150        }
151        return mapObj.entrySet().stream()
152            .map(e -> entryAsJson(e, indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT))
153            .collect(Collectors.joining(
154                String.format(",%n%s", " ".repeat(indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT)),
155                String.format("{%n%s", " ".repeat(indent + INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT)),
156                String.format("%n%s}", " ".repeat(indent))
157            ));
158    }
159
160    private static String entryAsJson(Map.Entry<?,?> entry, int indent) {
161        String entryKeyStr = "" + entry.getKey();
162        String entryValueStr = valueAsJson(entry.getValue(), indent);
163        return String.format("\"%s\": %s", entryKeyStr, entryValueStr);
164    }
165
166    private static String valueAsJson(Object obj, int indent) {
167        return obj == null ? "null" : switch (obj) {
168            case Map<?,?> mapObj -> mapAsJson(mapObj, indent);
169            case Collection<?> seqObj -> seqAsJson(seqObj, indent);
170            default -> String.format("\"%s\"", obj); // <-- think about escaping
171        };
172    }
173
174    private static final int INDENT_JSON_PRETTY_PRINT = 2;
175
176    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
177
178    private SysDumpUtils() {
179        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
180        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
181    }
182}
